div.p: Soil nitrogen mineralization (SNM) at 20 °C and 30 °C temperatures. GP, grass pasture; WP-NT, wheat-pea rotation under no-tillage; WP-CT, wheat-pea rotation under conventional tillage; and WF-CT, wheat-fallow under conventional tillage. Error bars indicate standard error, same lowercase letters indicate no significant difference between treatments within an incubation temperature and same upper case letters indicate no significant difference between incubation temperatures within a treatment (p = 0.05, Tukey test).
